name: Matrix.mem_specialUnitaryGroup_iff
declaration: theorem Matrix.mem_specialUnitaryGroup_iff {n : Type u_1} {α : Type u_2} [DecidableEq n] [Fintype n] [CommRing α] [StarRing α] {A : Matrix n n α} : A ∈ Matrix.specialUnitaryGroup n α ↔ A ∈ Matrix.unitaryGroup n α ∧ Matrix.det A = 1

name: StandardModel.GaugeGroupI
declaration:
/-- The global gauge group of the Standard Model with no discrete quotients.
The `I` in the Name is an indication of the statement that this has no discrete quotients. -/
def StandardModel.GaugeGroupI  : Type
